content: pattern contains - pdf file with a step-by-step description of the work in english - high-quality step-by-step photos where you can see all the details - diagrams of the pattern skill level easy materials needed 1 any yarn #2 sport baby i used yarnart jeans 55% cotton 45% pac 1 76 oz 174 yds 2 hook c-2 2 75 mm 3 scissors 4 tapestry needle 5 glass bead 6 sewing thread 7 sewing needle
